value.title: How to use the Azure Activity Log | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: The Azure Activity Log informs you of the who, the what and the when for operations in your Azure resources. In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn what activity logs are in the Azure Portal, how to access it, and how to make use of them.   Try out these features in the Azure portal:

value.title: How to use the Azure Virtual Machines Serial Console | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use the Azure Virtual Machines Serial Console to easily troubleshoot your virtual machines. The Azure Virtual Machine Serial Console feature is available for Windows and Linux VM images.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips

value.title: How to work with files in Azure App Service | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to work with files that you’ve uploaded to Azure App Service. Watch to find out what the different options are for interacting with the file system and your deployed applications in the Azure portal.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips/

value.title: How to work with the Azure billing and cost management API | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use the Azure billing APIs to automate Azure cost monitoring.    For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips   Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure: http://azure.com/free

value.title: Improve security with Azure Sentinel, a cloud-native SIEM and SOAR solution | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Sarah Young joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Sentinel, which is a scalable, cloud-native, security information event management (SIEM) and security orchestration automated response (SOAR) solution. Azure Sentinel delivers intelligent security analytics and threat intelligence across the enterprise,
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/oiWInLYvnUk" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Learn all about Distributed Application Runtime (Dapr), Part 1 | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Aman Bhardwaj and Yaron Schneider join Scott Hanselman to talk about the core concepts of Distributed Application Runtime (Dapr). Dapr is a portable, event-driven runtime that makes it easy for developers to build resilient, microservice stateless and stateful applications that run on the cloud and edge

value.title: Serverless containers with Azure Container Instances (ACI) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In this episode, Azure CTO Mark Russinovich joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can use Azure Container Instances (ACI) to host a containerized application. Mark deploys an image processing container in three ways: as a standalone ACI container, as part of a Logic Apps workflow, and as the backend

value.title: Unlock petabyte-scale datasets in Azure with aggregations in Power BI | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Christian Wade joins Scott Hanselman to show you how to unlock petabyte-scale datasets in Azure with a way that was not previously possible. Learn how to use the aggregations feature in Power BI to enable interactive analysis over big data.  For more information:  Power BI Desktop September 2018 Feature

value.title: Cloud storage
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Gain a deep understanding of data and how it's stored on the cloud.

topItems.title: Cloud storage overview
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Learn all about data and get an overview of how it's stored, including local and distributed file systems, databases, and object storage.

topItems.title: Case studies: Distributed file systems
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Discover how distributed file systems work, then learn about Hadoop and Ceph.

topItems.title: Case studies: NoSQL databases and cloud object storage
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Learn about two more types of storage - NoSQL databases and object storage - with case studies from industry.

value.title: Create conversational AI solutions
value.excerpt: Conversational AI revolves around user interactions, in this case through Bots. In this learning path, you will learn how to create chat bots and integrate the bot with various AI services to add intelligence to the interaction. Learn how to integrate the QnA Maker Service (an easy method to add question and answers for bots), and explore the new Virtual Assistant scenarios for creating branded experiences with bots.

topItems.title: Build a chat bot with the Azure portal
topItems.excerpt: Create and test a basic chat bot using the Azure portal

topItems.title: Design a bot conversation flow
topItems.excerpt: Learn the principles of good bot design and implement conversational flows, knowledge bots, and how to hand-off interactions to a human.

topItems.title: Create a Bot with the Bot Framework Composer
topItems.excerpt: User the Bot Framework Composer to quickly and easily build sophisticated conversational bots without writing code.

value.title: Describe the capabilities of Microsoft security solutions
value.excerpt: Describe the capabilities of Microsoft security solutions

topItems.title: Describe basic security capabilities in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Describe basic security capabilities in Azure

topItems.title: Describe security management capabilities of Azure
topItems.excerpt: Describe security management capabilities of Azure

topItems.title: Describe security capabilities of Azure Sentinel
topItems.excerpt: Describe security capabilities of Azure Sentinel

value.title: Implement knowledge mining with Azure Cognitive Search
value.excerpt: Do you have information locked up in structured and unstructured data sources?  Using Azure Cognitive Search, you can extract key insights from this data, and enable applications to search and analyze them.

topItems.title: Create an Azure Cognitive Search solution
topItems.excerpt: Unlock the hidden insights in your data with Azure Cognitive Search.

topItems.title: Create an enrichment pipeline with Azure Cognitive Search
topItems.excerpt: Use the power of artificial intelligence to enrich your data and find new insights.

topItems.title: Create a knowledge store with Azure Cognitive Search
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to persist the output from an Azure Cognitive Search enrichment pipeline for independent analysis or downstream processing.

value.title: Large-Scale Data Processing with Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
value.excerpt: With this learning path, you'll use Azure Data Lake Storage to process your Big Data efficiently and easily while also being protected by Azure’s host of security features.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
topItems.excerpt: Discover how Data Lake Storage provides a repository where you can upload and store unstructured data bringing new efficiencies to processing big data analytics.

topItems.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn about creating an Azure Data Lake Storage account and uploading data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2 through the Azure Storage Explorer.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Optimize query performance in SQL Server
value.excerpt: Analyze individual query performance and determine where improvements can be made. Explore performance-related Dynamic Management Objects. Investigate how indexes and database design affect queries.

topItems.title: Describe SQL Server query plans
topItems.excerpt: Read and understand various forms of execution plans. Compare estimated vs actual plans. Learn how and why plans are generated.

topItems.title: Evaluate performance improvements
topItems.excerpt: Evaluate possible changes to indexes. Determine the impact of changes to queries and indexes. Explore relevant Dynamic Management Objects.

topItems.title: Explore performance-based design
topItems.excerpt: Evaluate possible changes to indexes. Determine the impact of changes to queries and indexes. Explore relevant Dynamic Management Objects.

value.title: SC-900 part 3: Describe the capabilities of Microsoft security solutions
value.excerpt: SC-900 part 3: Describe the capabilities of Microsoft security solutions

topItems.title: Describe basic security capabilities in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Describe basic security capabilities in Azure

topItems.title: Describe security management capabilities of Azure
topItems.excerpt: Describe security management capabilities of Azure

topItems.title: Describe security capabilities of Azure Sentinel
topItems.excerpt: Describe security capabilities of Azure Sentinel

value.title: Add and size disks in Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn about your virtual machine storage options and how to choose between standard and premium, managed and unmanaged disks for your Azure virtual machine.

value.title: Add basic conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: Learn to identify valuable information in conversations with LUIS for interpreting user goals (intents) and distill valuable information from sentences (entities).

value.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn how to add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
value.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, use cases, and special factors of an enterprise AI strategy that creates real business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

value.title: Distributed computing on the cloud: GraphLab
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's cloud developer course. GraphLab is a big data tool developed by Carnegie Mellon University to help with data mining. Learn about how GraphLab works and why it's useful.

value.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Dynamically meet changing web app performance requirements with autoscale rules
value.excerpt: Respond to periods of high activity by incrementally adding resources, and then removing these resources when activity drops, to reduce costs.

value.title: Automate IoT devices management with Azure IoT Hub
value.excerpt: Automate IoT devices management with Azure IoT Hub

value.title: Automate machine learning model selection with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use automated machine learning in Azure Machine Learning to find the best model for your data.

value.title: Build and store container images with Azure Container Registry
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

value.title: Create a long-running serverless workflow with Durable Functions
value.excerpt: Learn how to orchestrate a long-running workflow as a set of activities using scalable and cost-effective Durable Functions.
